title: (x) Meet Joe Black movie poster - Trajan {Karl}
content:
[http://images-eu.amazon.com/images/P/B00004CZ9S.02.LZZZZZZZ.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828033400/http:/images-eu.amazon.com/images/P/B00004CZ9S.02.LZZZZZZZ.gif)   
   
check out the poster and tell me the typeface please. Should be an easy one, right?   
Thanks!

 [‹ InterragatorEZ logo script face](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828033400/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2603 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Soda.co.uk logo - custom designed {Adriano E} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828033400/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2569 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content:
Trajan is about the most widely used typeface for movie   
posters and trailers. Small type credits at the bottom of   
movie posters are almost always Univers Ultra Condensed.   
   
Karl, that was 1 minute. Like in: _ONE MINUTE_. No comment.   
 ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828033400im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
No, I mean it. Repeat after me: _ONE - friggin' - MINUTE_.
Seriously, do you realize what you just did?
To be fair, I probably could have guessed trajan without even looking at the image. It's so common for movie posters.

Je hebt teveel koffie op man ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828033400im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
Anyways, that was really fast, Karl. That goes to the records for sure!

yeah, you guys are absolutely amazing!   
Thanks a lot!!

Nice.   
   
Thanks to Karl, we'll have to include the seconds in the time stamp now. =)   
   
(Oh, and I have to say _Meet Joe Black_ is a great movie, even if they used Trajan.)
So did I actually get that in under 60 seconds?!?
